about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Creative Web Designer Based in New York
about.description1: I'm a passionate web developer with 5+ years of experience creating modern and responsive websites and applications. My goal is to build fast, accessible, and user-friendly digital experiences that solve real problems.
about.description2: I specialize in Vue.js, React, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks like Tailwind CSS. I love learning new technologies and constantly improving my craft.
